definitions.definition: To hash ( chop food into small pieces ) again.

examples: Today's parliamentary session only rehashed last week's arguments.
The CEO of the company only rehashed a speech for the news conference.
The general rehashed plans for the war.

definitions.definition: To analyze a prior contentious or embarrassing event.
examples: Let's not rehash what we did last night.

definitions.definition: To recompute the structure of a hash table , taking into account any newly added items.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To hash ( chop food into small pieces ) again.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To repeat with minor variation .
( transitive ) To analyze a prior contentious or embarrassing event.
( transitive , computing ) To recompute the structure of a hash table , taking into account any newly added items.
